heading: Class B license
text:
An applicant for a class B hoisting machine operator license shall have a class A basic hoisting
  machine operator license, and shall have at least two years experience prior to application under the direct and continuing
   supervision of a Class B licensed hoisting machine operator operating the equipment for which he or she is applying for
  endorsement and shall satisfactorily demonstrate by operation that he or she is competent to operate a crane with a boom,
  including jibs and other extensions, exceeding 200 feet (60 960 mm) in length or truck-mounted tower crane exceeding 200 feet
  (60 960 mm) in height, or as otherwise provided in rules of the department.
